title: The Russian Revolution/Leninism or Marxism?
description: Rosa Luxemburg (1870-1919), one of the most remarkable and controversial personalities in the Marxist movement, opposes in this book not the Bolshevikâ€™s quest for power but the way they took power, the way they held power, the way they justified themselves in doing both.
